title.sub: Price trends along the food supply chain
footnoteText3: Data for certain dimensions are not available as they are submitted by EU Member States to Eurostat on a voluntary basis.
info:
The Food Price Monitoring Tool includes the available data on price developments through the food supply chain.
For 26 food products the tool shows agricultural commodity price indices, producer price indices, import price indices and consumer price indices.

For more information, please read the metadata.
